highlights.name: Collecting and storing your data
highlights.description: Details on how a website collects and stores your data.

highlights.name: Third party access to your data
highlights.description: Details on how other services can potentially use your data.

highlights.name: Removing your data
highlights.description: Details on what a website does with your data when you close your account.

highlights.name: Last update date
highlights.description: Details on when the website last updated this policy.

highlights.name: Contact information
highlights.description: Details on how you can contact the website if you have any questions or concerns.

highlights.name: Website rights
highlights.description: Details on what the company has power to do without your consent.

highlights.name: Sharing, tracking, and arbitration
highlights.description: Details on your rights and what the website can do or what information you can limit.

highlights.name: Selling or giving access to your data
highlights.description: Details if the website is selling access to your information or selling a profile of your information.
